record.svcOptions: <form><select id="flrnum" label="Select a floor:" mandatory="true" style="combo" visible="true"><option label=""/><option id="0" label="Ground">Ground</option><option id="1" label="1st Floor">1st Floor</option><option id="2" label="2nd Floor">2nd Floor</option><option id="3" label="3rd Floor">3rd Floor</option><option id="4" label="4th Floor">4th Floor</option><option id="5" label="5th Floor">5th Floor</option><option id="6" label="N/A">N/A</option></select><select id="gender" label="Bathroom Gender:" mandatory="true" style="combo" visible="true"><option label=""/><option label="Men's">Men's</option><option label="Women's">Women's</option></select><text id="direction" label="Provide additional directions to restroom (e.g. north side of building):" mandatory="true" multiline="true" visible="true"/><select id="item" label="Women's item requiring attention:" mandatory="[gender]="Women's"" style="combo" visible="[gender]="Women's""><option label=""/><option id="0" label="Paper Towels">Paper Towels</option><option id="1" label="Toilet Paper">Toilet Paper</option><option id="2" label="Toilet Seat Repair">Toilet Seat Repair</option><option id="3" label="Clogged Toilet">Clogged Toilet</option><option id="4" label="Clogged Sink">Clogged Sink</option><option id="5" label="Light Out">Light Out</option><option id="6" label="Sanitary Bag Dispenser">Sanitary Bag Dispenser</option><option id="7" label="Other">Other</option></select><select id="menitem" label="Men's item requiring attention:" mandatory="[gender]="Men's"" style="combo" visible="[gender]="Men's""><option label=""/><option id="0" label="Paper Towels">Paper Towels</option><option id="1" label="Toilet Paper">Toilet Paper</option><option id="2" label="Toilet Seat Repair">Toilet Seat Repair</option><option id="3" label="Clogged Toilet">Clogged Toilet</option><option id="4" label="Clogged Sink">Clogged Sink</option><option id="5" label="Light Out">Light Out</option><option id="6" label="Other">Other</option></select><select id="pprtwl" label="Paper Towel Action:" mandatory="[item]="Paper Towels"|[menitem]="Paper Towels"" style="combo" visible="[item]="Paper Towels"|[menitem]="Paper Towels""><option label=""/><option id="0" label="Restock">Restock</option><option id="1" label="Repair Dispenser">Repair Dispenser</option></select><select id="tltppr" label="Toilet Paper Action:" mandatory="[item]="Toilet Paper"|[menitem]="Toilet Paper"" style="combo" visible="[item]="Toilet Paper"|[menitem]="Toilet Paper""><option label=""/><option id="0" label="Restock">Restock</option><option id="1" label="Repair Dispenser">Repair Dispenser</option></select><select id="tltstr" label="Toilet Seat Action:" mandatory="[item]="Toilet Seat Repair"|[menitem]="Toilet Seat Repair"" style="combo" visible="[item]="Toilet Seat Repair"|[menitem]="Toilet Seat Repair""><option label=""/><option id="0" label="Repair">Repair</option><option id="1" label="Replace">Replace</option></select><select id="sntont" label="Sanitary Bag Dispenser Action:" mandatory="[item]="Sanitary Bag Dispenser"" style="combo" visible="[item]="Sanitary Bag Dispenser""><option label=""/><option id="0" label="Restock">Restock</option><option id="1" label="Repair Dispenser">Repair Dispenser</option><option id="2" label="Empty">Empty</option></select><text id="other" label="Please specify details for item classified as other:" mandatory="[item]="Other"|[menitem]="Other"" multiline="true" visible="[item]="Other"|[menitem]="Other""/></form>
